bib_parsed.title: Collective Tuning Initiative: automating and accelerating development and optimization of computing systems

notes.note: Introduced concept of crowd-tuning using public repositories of knowledge, autotuning, machine learning and crowd-sourcing, and new publication model where results are continuously validated and extended by the community [$#cm_e84a25bcb528c798_cbd09ece363c9f84#$]
MILEPOST GCC software [$#cm_d76ac3bb9a3f744c_38aa288519b38bf7#$]; most of technology is now available in mainline GCC and is being added to major commercial compilers
cTuning public optimization repository of knowledge [$#cm_4d63887b5cda54aa_122a0cb1e6ff9fc1#$]

All benchmarks, datasets, tools, models and experimental results have been released to public for collaborative validation and extension! See our new research and publication proposal [$#cm_29db2248aba45e59_40a4b58adfb594a8#$]!

title: Collective Tuning Initiative: automating and accelerating development and optimization of computing systems
